participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, with a passion for literature and animal welfare.
participant_1.background: I like to check out the latest aviation news and ballet events on my favorite websites. I'm tired of having to read subtitles. I'm moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection. I am an animal rights activist. I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and diligent, focused on personal growth and companionship with pets.
participant_2.background: I spent my last vacation relaxing on the beach and reading books. I am a dog walker. My family tries to convince me to dump my fiancé. I am a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies. I work at a restaurant as a waiter.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a big reader and I love animals. What are your hobbies?
I am a dog walker and I love spending time with my dog. I also love reading books.
That's so cool! I like dogs too. I'm actually moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection.
That's awesome! I love moving to new places. It's so exciting to explore a new area and meet new people.
I agree! I'm also tired of having to read subtitles. I'm looking forward to being able to watch movies and shows in English without having to read the subtitles.
That's great! I'm sure you'll enjoy your new home.
